thoughts.text: Now that I have saved some of the scavenger hunt ideas, I think I can use the 'generate_image' command to create a visual representation of the activity.
thoughts.reasoning: Creating a visual representation of the scavenger hunt can help me better understand the activity and make it more engaging. The 'generate_image' command is a good way to create a visual representation.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'generate_image' command to create a visual representation of the scavenger hunt
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time creating the image and instead focus on taking action and actually pursuing one of the activities.
thoughts.speak: Now that I have saved some of the scavenger hunt ideas, I will use the 'generate_image' command to create a visual representation of the activity. What should the visual representation look like?

args.prompt: Create a visual representation of a scavenger hunt
